title: Morocco: Flawed Draft Disability Rights Law (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) ( Rabat , October 26 , 2015 ) - A draft law before Morocco 's parliament on disability rights conflicts with Morocco's obligations under an international treaty, Human Rights Watch said today in a letter to
